info.name: DNATestingSystem.SOAP.TienDM
info.description: Collection for testing DNA Testing System SOAP API Services

body.raw:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<soap:Envelope xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
               xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"
               xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/">
  <soap:Body>
    <CreateAppointmentsTienDm xmlns="http://tempuri.org/">
      <appointment>
        <UserAccountId>2</UserAccountId>
        <ServicesNhanVtid>2</ServicesNhanVtid>
        <AppointmentStatusesTienDmid>2</AppointmentStatusesTienDmid>
        <AppointmentDate>2025-01-18</AppointmentDate>
        <AppointmentTime>11:20:00</AppointmentTime>
        <SamplingMethod>AA Sample Method</SamplingMethod>
        <Address>123 Main St, City</Address>
        <ContactPhone>0904567890</ContactPhone>
        <Notes>APSCStatus Update: Service completed</Notes>
        <TotalAmount>2.00</TotalAmount>
        <IsPaid>true</IsPaid>
      </appointment>
    </CreateAppointmentsTienDm>
  </soap:Body>
</soap:Envelope>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<soap:Envelope xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" 
               xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" 
               xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/">
  <soap:Body>
    <UpdateAppointmentsTienDm xmlns="http://tempuri.org/">
      <id>5</id>
      <appointment>
        <UserAccountId>1</UserAccountId>
        <ServicesNhanVtid>1</ServicesNhanVtid>
        <AppointmentStatusesTienDmid>2</AppointmentStatusesTienDmid>
        <AppointmentDate>2025-07-15</AppointmentDate>
        <AppointmentTime>15:30:00</AppointmentTime>
        <SamplingMethod>Saliva Sample</SamplingMethod>
        <Address>456 Updated Street, Ho Chi Minh City</Address>
        <ContactPhone>0987654321</ContactPhone>
        <Notes>Updated appointment via Postman</Notes>
        <TotalAmount>750000</TotalAmount>
        <IsPaid>true</IsPaid>
      </appointment>
    </UpdateAppointmentsTienDm>
  </soap:Body>
</soap:Envelope>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<soap:Envelope xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
               xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"
               xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/">
  <soap:Body>
    <TestAppointmentData xmlns="http://tempuri.org/">
      <appointment>
        <UserAccountId>2</UserAccountId>
        <ServicesNhanVtid>3</ServicesNhanVtid>
        <AppointmentStatusesTienDmid>4</AppointmentStatusesTienDmid>
        <AppointmentDate>2025-01-18</AppointmentDate>
        <AppointmentTime>11:20:00</AppointmentTime>
        <SamplingMethod>AA Sample</SamplingMethod>
        <Address>123 Main St, City</Address> 
        <ContactPhone>0904567890</ContactPhone>
        <Notes>APSCStatus Update: Service completed</Notes>
        <TotalAmount>2.00</TotalAmount>
        <IsPaid>true</IsPaid>
      </appointment>
    </TestAppointmentData>
  </soap:Body>
</soap:Envelope>
